activation.ReallyYourEmail: Ngaba ngokwenene le dilesi yemeyile yakho, {{1}}? Ukuba kunjalo, cofa apha ukuseta ibinzana lakho lokugqithisa kwaye uvule iakhawunti yakho.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Nali ikhonkco lokuzikhupha ukuba awufuni ukufumana ezinye ii-imeyile.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Heyi, oku kukwazisa nje {{1}} ihlawuliswe {{2}} nge {{3}} ngu {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Hey {{1}}, olu luqinisekiso olukhawulezayo lokuba uhlawule ngempumelelo {{2}} ku {{3}} ye {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: Ufumana le-imeyile kuba kukho umntu ofake idilesi yakho ye-imeyile kwaye wacofa "ibinzana lokugqithisa elilibeleyo". Ukuba ibingenguwe, vele ungawuhoyi lo myalezo.
resend.Reset: Ukuseta ngokutsha ibinzana lakho lokugqithisa, cofa {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Hey {{1}}, uqalile umrhumo wakho ukuya {{2}} nge {{3}} e {{4}} for {{5}} iinyanga.
subscription.HasStarted: Oku kukwazisa nje {{1}}, uqalile umrhumo wabo ukuya {{2}} nge {{3}} e {{4}} for {{5}} iinyanga.
